ProductInfo.Features:
Features a powerful and robust Dual Core CPU with DDR3 RAM, makes everything run faster than ever. Plus, high-performance graphics Quad Core Mali-400 GPU ensures smooth and dynamic 3D graphics
Google Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) OS reveals tons of new adventures to your Arch™ tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed. Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs
When compared to standard A13 models on Amazon, this newly upgraded 8GB tablet has a higher resolution Multi-Touch HD Screen with 1024x600 which makes ebooks, photos, and video look vibrant
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter
Fulfilled by Amazon for great customer service and fast shipping!
ProductInfo.Name: NEW Arch™ 7 inch Android Tablet PC DUAL CORE, DUAL CAMERA Google Android 4.2 OS, HD 1024x600, 8GB ROM, Google Play Pre-load, HDMI, 3D Game Supported (NEW enhanced version of A13) (Red Blast)
